Our process

We take your project from a concept to a reality whilst keeping you in the loop.

How do I get site reports

We provide our clients with quarterly site reports based on the project timeline. As a client you'll be able to receive your reports via your preferred contact method.

Our Logistics Network

With a presence spanning across Tanzania, AFAK Tanzania Ltd is instrumental in the distribution of goods across the country.

What about our safety measures ?

We are certified by OSHA and we adhere to OSHA's policy and rules both on site and off-site.
